abstract: Rio Tinto has agreed to sell a majority stake in the cable division of its Alcan Engineered Products to private equity firm Platinum Equity, as the mining giant moves toward a break-up of the business.
snippet: Rio Tinto has agreed to sell a majority stake in the cable division of its Alcan Engineered Products to private equity firm Platinum Equity, as the mining giant moves toward a break-up of the business.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto has agreed to sell a majority stake in the cable division of its Alcan Engineered Products to the private equity firm Platinum Equity, as the mining giant moves toward a break-up of the business.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Sells Stake in Alcan Unit to P.E. Firm
